resources.string: there will be all app related settings
here will be a few shortcuts for user selected communities and groups, all the joined communities and all the joined groups

in this page will be listed the currently active users, currently active groups, recent chats in/with groups/users.
the label in the top bar will be replace with search field for searching in chats.
there will be the recent searched users, recent searched groups and the label in the top bar will be replace with search field for searching in all communities and available groups
there will be the users photo and other related information, such as the communities admin by that user and the groups admin by that user
